metadata.title: CVE-2017-6839 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in modules/MSADPCM.cpp in Audio File Library (akaaudiofile) 0.3.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

audiofile-tools - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
libaudiofile1 - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: audiofile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1').
